overview: A factory worker goes to his job drunk, and unfortunately for him, he happens to work at the most volatile burrito factory in the world, Bean Co. After passing out drunk, he releases the foulest smelling gas ever. Instead of a bad day for some, it turns people into farting zombies! Opposite of this are our hero's Ron and Angie. They just want a quiet weekend in the mountains away from their roommates. However, after leaving the house, they hear a radio broadcast late into the night about some mishaps at their town, Dogwood, Ga. After calling Lee and getting disconnected. They decide to return to Dogwood, but due to the crazy happens in Dogwood, Ron decides to go through a quicker path through the woods. This leads them back to the trailer where they encounter Zombies and a man named Zeik. The journey is sure to be a long and smelly one at best!
title: Deadwind: The Sharting Dead
